Title: Time Masters
Writer: Stefan Wul (novel), René Laloux (scenario and adaptation), Jean 'Moebius' Giraud (scenario and adaptation), Jean-Patrick Manchette (dialogue)
Actors: Jean Valmont, Michel Elias, Frédéric Legros, Yves-Marie Maurin
Plot: Piel, a 7 or 8 year old boy, is alone on the desert planet Perdide, only survivor of an attack by giant hornets. Calling for help, Piel's father's friend Jaffar keeps contact with the kid and hurries across space toward Perdide.
Country: France, Switzerland, West Germany, UK, Hungary
